Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 20-24 We have previously demonstrated a novel naphtho-[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole) ( NT ) moiety with enlarged planarity relative to conventionally used acceptor of 2,1,3benzothiadiazole ( BT ) , which can be used as a strong acceptor for D-A polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Naphtho-[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole) |
| 2,1,3-Benzothiadiazole |

The two material names in the paragraph are:

1. Naphtho-[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole) (abbreviated as NT)
2. 2,1,3-Benzothiadiazole (abbreviated as BT)
